snippet: A man who answered an online advertisement to donate sperm to a lesbian couple is fighting the state’s efforts to force him to pay child support for the girl conceived through artificial insemination.
abstract: William Marotta, Kansas man who answered online advertisement to donate sperm to lesbian couple in 2009, is fighting state’s efforts to force him to pay child support for girl conceived through artificial insemination.
lead_paragraph: A man who answered an online advertisement to donate sperm to a lesbian couple is fighting the state’s efforts to force him to pay child support for the girl conceived through artificial insemination.

headline.seo: Kansas: Sperm Donor Is Ordered to Pay Support
headline.main: Kansas: Sperm Donor Is Ordered to Pay Support
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Sperm Donor Is Ordered To Pay Support
